text: Filip Erić (born 10 October 1994) is a Serbian professional football goalkeeper who plays for Bosnian Premier League club Željezničar. With Zvijezda 09, he won the First League of RS in the 2017–18 season and got promoted to the Bosnian Premier League. He left the club after his contract expired on 29 May 2019. On 13 June 2019, Erić signed a two year contract with Željezničar. ==Honours== Zvijezda 09 *First League of RS: 2017–18 ==References== ==External links== * Filip Erić at Sofascore *Filip Erić at nfsbih.ba Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Loznica Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:First League of the Republika Srpska players Category:Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina players Category:FK Voždovac players Category:FK Drina Zvornik players Category:FK Rad players Category:FK Sloboda Tuzla players Category:FK Zvijezda 09 players Category:FK Željezničar players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Filip Erić
